item.title: 6Hr Fun Guide Different Options Tour for Cruiser or Hotel Guests
item.description:
This is a Sedan or Van Tour. These more than 10 places & activities would be challenging to organize on your own with a short time in port; this tour professionally combines them and arranges all the details in advance so you can enjoy them in a very relaxing manner.
We do not waste your time making shopping stops in our tours.
When staying in a Hotel or when your cruise ship docks on Acapulco's port embark on a tour that allows you to sightsee in addition to participating in a baby turtle release ceremony.
The sightseeing tour hits all the Acapulco highlights, including La Quebrada High Cliff Divers, Diego Rivera's mural, & the Chapel of Peace, the City Market, Old Sector, The New Area, Diamond Acapulco & every attraction in town.
Pickup and drop-off right at the hotel or cruise terminal (accordingly to your cruise arrival). If you are staying in a hotel at 9:00 am. Alcoholic beverages or sodas will be included ONLY if Private Option selected. Please check different options

image.alt: 6Hr Fun Guide Different Options Tour for Cruiser or Hotel Guests

item.title: 4hr Fun Guide Tour For Cruisers or Hotels Guests with Divers Show
item.description: See more of Acapulco in less time during a small-group sightseeing tour, ideal for first-time visitors. In a small group limited to 15, you’ll tick off top Acapulco attractions such as Las Brisas, the clifftop Chapel of Peace, Acapulco Bay, and La Quebrada Cliff Divers. All entrance fees and hotel pickup and drop-off are included.

image.alt: 4hr Fun Guide Tour For Cruisers or Hotels Guests with Divers Show

item.title: Historic Tour of Acapulco
item.description: Discover the highlights and historical sites of Acapulco on this all-day guided sightseeing tour. Watch the La Quebrada Cliff Divers, a group of professional high divers that sail down from the cliffs into the sea. Visit Los Flamingos Hotel, a former hotspot for Hollywood stars. And stop by a silver factory and an arts-and-craft market.

image.alt: Historic Tour of Acapulco

item.title: 4-6Hrs Acapulco City Tour With a Fun Guide. Diver Show, Mex Lunch
item.description: Take your Acapulco experience to the next level, with your own local guide for your personal group. This day-long tour packs in all the Acapulco highlights such as the cliff divers, the Chapel of Peace, and Hotel Flamingo, along with cultural experiences such as a turtle nesting encounter and a taco lunch at an authentic local eatery. Even better: the tour is private, so can be tailored to you.

image.alt: 4-6Hrs Acapulco City Tour With a Fun Guide. Diver Show, Mex Lunch

item.title: Airport Taxi Service
item.description: Arrive at the Acapulco Airport stress-free, knowing your reliable driver has tracked your flight and is waiting to take you to your next destination. No need to stress if your flight is delayed. And no need to wait in line for taxis or share your ride with others. Just sit back and enjoy your time in Acapulco.

image.alt: Airport Taxi Service

item.title: Paddle Boarding At Acapulco´s Bay
item.description:
We will row on paddle boards in the hotel zone, and in the area near El Morro Islet
You do not require previous experience or know how to swim.
We have also come to find turtles, dolphins and even whales in the Bay.
You can bring your pet, what better than to have fun with your best friend, we are petfriendly!
Our instructors are trained to give you confidence and safety in the water, even if you do not have previous experience or know how to swim.
Our boards were manufactured especially for our service, they are designed so that people with or without previous experience can easily row.

image.alt: Paddle Boarding At Acapulco´s Bay

item.title: Low Cost Acapulco Airport Shuttle BOTH WAYS PROVIDER
item.description: Enjoy a secure and affordable transportation experience with this airport shuttle service that ensures punctuality and customer satisfaction. Travel hassle-free from Acapulco International Airport (ACA) to any destination in Acapulco center. As Acapulco has a small airport, your courteous driver will be waiting outside the airport building upon your arrival. Say goodbye to the confusion of public transport or waiting for taxis with this convenient round trip airport transfer service.

image.alt: Low Cost Acapulco Airport Shuttle BOTH WAYS PROVIDER

item.title: DeLuxe Cliff Divers+Sunset Exhibition byNight w/Different Options
item.description: Treat yourself to a romantic dinner and watch the famous cliff divers of Acapulco at La Perla. Located in the historic El Mirador hotel—and overlooking the Pacific Ocean—La Perla will serve up a 3-course dinner while the cliff divers plunge into the water below. Hotel/cruise ship pickup, guided tour, and two glasses of wine or cocktails included.

image.alt: DeLuxe Cliff Divers+Sunset Exhibition byNight w/Different Options

item.title: 2 Tank Boat Dives for Certified Divers
item.description: Head to Isla la Roqueta (Roqueta Island) on a 2-tank dive from Acapulco. You'll have the chance to see eagle rays, puffer fish, seahorses, and other Pacific marine life. This is for certified divers only.

image.alt: 2 Tank Boat Dives for Certified Divers

item.title: Cliff Diver De Luxe with Different Options at "La Quebrada"
item.description: Spend an evening in Acapulco watching the cliff divers of La Quebrada from the comfort of the elegant La Perla restaurant. Observe the cliff diving show accompanied by one of the following three options: two drinks; a 3-course dinner; or a 3-course dinner with two drinks. If desired, you can also visit the Los Flamingos Hotel for a drink during the sunset hour before continuing to the cliff show. Includes transportation, drinks and/or dinner, and hotel pickup and drop-off.

image.alt: Cliff Diver De Luxe with Different Options at "La Quebrada"

item.title: Small-Group or Private All Inclusive 4 Hours City Tour & Divers
item.description: Discover top tourist spots, plus see the cliff divers, during this guided tour of Acapulco. First, stop at the Chapel of Peace, which offers sea views, and the Trouyet Cross. Throughout the tour, learn about the country’s history, geography, economics, and politics. After watching the cliff divers show, visit at the mural of artist Diego Rivera to snap some photos.

image.alt: Small-Group or Private All Inclusive 4 Hours City Tour & Divers

item.title: AfroMexican Village Experience-Horseback Ride-Turtle Hatch &Crocs
item.description: Easily combine several activities in Acapulco in this single tour, with all details arranged in advance. Saddle up to ride down the sandy beach; expert guidance and supervision means both experts and novices will enjoy the ride. Participate in a baby turtle release program. Arranging all of these activities individually would be difficult, but this tour takes care of the logistics so you can just focus on the experience.

image.alt: AfroMexican Village Experience-Horseback Ride-Turtle Hatch &Crocs

item.title: Jungle Coyuca Lagoon Boat Ride Experience & Baby Turtle Release
item.description: Visit Acapulco’s Coyuca Lagoon and witch doctor market on a family-friendly guided tour. After a convenient hotel pickup, travel with your guide and small group to the market to learn about its traditional medicinal supplies. Enjoy a boat cruise on the scenic Coyuca Lagoon, eat a lunch of fresh seafood and other typical Mexican dishes, and release endangered turtle babies into the Pacific—all on this affordable full-day outing.

image.alt: Jungle Coyuca Lagoon Boat Ride Experience & Baby Turtle Release

item.title: 6Hr Cruise or Hotels City Tour, Divers, Baby Turtles Peace Chapel
item.description: Get to know Acapulco's highlights on this comprehensive city tour. With your guide's commentary to shed light on the daily life of local residents, as well as the history and future of this bustling city, visit the landmarks that make up the city's heart. Stops include the Cliff Divers, the Chapel of Peace, the Vallarino Turtle Camp, and others. Round-trip hotel transportation included.

image.alt: 6Hr Cruise or Hotels City Tour, Divers, Baby Turtles Peace Chapel

item.title: Taxco Best Seller Full Day Thorough Experience Breakfast & Lunch
item.description: Explore the town of Taxco on this all-day tour from Acapulco. Wander around this small colonial city, located in the north Sierra Madre Mountains, with cobblestone streets, white stucco houses with red-tiled roofs, and wrought-iron balconies. Plus, visit the baroque Santa Prisca Cathedral. During the tour, you’ll also have time to shop for souvenirs.

image.alt: Taxco Best Seller Full Day Thorough Experience Breakfast & Lunch

item.title: Acapulco Airport Roundtrip Transfers
item.description: Enjoy a smooth and stress-free vacation from the moment you touch down in Acapulco with a round-trip airport transfer. Sail past enormous taxi lines and crowded bus terminals as you travel directly to your hotel from Acapulco International Airport. When your time in Mexico comes to an end, your return journey to the airport will be equally efficient with direct transportation to your departure flight.

image.alt: Acapulco Airport Roundtrip Transfers

item.title: Immersive & Fun Historical Cultural Experience &City Market Visit
item.description: Dive into Acapulco's history and heritage with a local guide who shares the highlights of the city. See the Fort of San Diego, The Cathedral, Diego Rivera's mosaic mural, and check out the shopping options at the municipal market (Mercado Municipal). You'll also watch the cliff divers jump from dizzying heights at La Quebrada, stop at the Flamingo Hotel—historically popular with Hollywood stars, and have time to purchase lunch at a charming restaurant on the beach. Includes guide, entrance fees, and hotel or port pickup and drop-off.

image.alt: Immersive & Fun Historical Cultural Experience &City Market Visit

item.title: Acapulco Cliff Divers at Night
item.description: Witness the courageous cliff divers of La Quebrada, as they soar from dizzy heights into shallow waters below, on this 3-hour evening tour from Acapulco. Absorb the sophisticated ambience of the stylish La Perla restaurant as you enjoy a gourmet extravaganza of fine foods and delicious deserts. Gasp as the daring divers plunge into the crashing waves of the ocean and marvel at how the inky black backdrop of the night accentuates the drama of this fascinating cultural expression.

image.alt: Acapulco Cliff Divers at Night

item.title: Scuba Diving for Beginners in Acapulco
item.description: Take the plunge with this scuba lesson for beginners. Explore the crystalline waters surrounding Roqueta Island, off Acapulco’s coast, while diving with an experienced instructor. Enjoy snacks and drinks—a vegetarian option is available—and upgrade to an extended experience with a second dive. Hotel pickup and drop off are included.

image.alt: Scuba Diving for Beginners in Acapulco

item.title: Lagoon Ride AfroMex Village Baby Turtle Release &Croc Farm Visit
item.description: Perfect for nature-lovers, this private lagoon ride takes you into the heart of a scenic bird sanctuary. Glide through mango tunnels, coconut plantations, and a hanging garden of wildflowers. The boat cruise is not only a relaxing way to travel, it also guarantees the best views. Keep an eye out for pelicans, storks, and herons. You’ll end the tour with a savory lunch, with free time to explore on foot.

image.alt: Lagoon Ride AfroMex Village Baby Turtle Release &Croc Farm Visit

item.title: Kayaks Tour to El Morro Islet
item.description:
Kayaking paddling around El Morro Islet
Go up to explore the area of caves, trails, and enjoy the most spectacular view of the Bay from the top of the Islote.
You do not require previous experience or know how to swim.
From the top we have come to observe dolphins and whales inside the Bay
Our instructors are trained to give you confidence and safety in the water, even if you don't have previous experience or know how to swim.

image.alt: Kayaks Tour to El Morro Islet

item.title: Private & Personalized Car or Van Rental with a Local Tour Guide
item.description: See the sights of Acapulco in the comfort of a private vehicle on this van tour for a group of up to 10 people. You'll be picked up by a driver-guide and taken around the area to check out any attractions that interest you. As this is a private tour, you can enjoy a customized experience.

image.alt: Private & Personalized Car or Van Rental with a Local Tour Guide

item.title: Tour Isla de la Roqueta Stand up paddle Acapulco
item.description: We paddle in the most crystalline waters of the port of Acapulco. The island of La Roqueta is a spectacular place that gives us beautiful landscapes and beaches to be able to paddle them accompanied by our Stand Up paddle boards. We provide you with the most refreshing fruit cocktail on the most beautiful beaches of the island of La Roqueta. The island has different spots that will give you the best souvenir photos on your visit to Acapulco.

image.alt: Tour Isla de la Roqueta Stand up paddle Acapulco

item.title: AfroMexican Village Lagoon Boat Ride Turtle Release Crocs Farm
item.description: Book this Laguna de Tres Palos Boat Ride and Crocodile Farm Experience from Acapulco and guarantee a fun day in nature while in the area. This experience provides round-trip transport from Acapulco, lunch, and a guide to lead the way. Escape the busy city and go on a boat ride in Laguna de Tres Palos to take in the views of the surrounding flora and fauna, and then head to a crocodile farm to learn about the reptiles.

image.alt: AfroMexican Village Lagoon Boat Ride Turtle Release Crocs Farm
